catalog.description: Course meets only once to provide information on the Oral Proficiency Interview and Writing Proficiency Test, required of all majors and minors.
catalog.note: NOTE: For students majoring in Spanish, Spanish Studies, Spanish Teaching, or Spanish Translation only, or for students with a Spanish minor or Spanish Teaching minor. NOTE: No major or minor credit. NOTE: Exam registration instructions will be emailed after the add/drop deadline.
catalog.title: Senior Proficiency Evaluation.

course_headers.header_text: SPAN 491 requires that students complete three exams:  Oral Proficiency Interview (OPI), Written Profiency Test (WPT), and the Reading Proficiency Test.  Exam registration instructions will be e-mailed after the add/drop deadline.  No class attendance is necessary.
For students majoring in Spanish, Spanish Studies, Spanish Teaching, or Spanish Translation only, or for students with a Spanish minor or Spanish Teaching minor.
